description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. In the future, your brain gets put inside an advanced warship.  Aliens invade.  Fight them off with a combination of guns, missiles, fighters, and supporting fleet ships in this shooter/strategy hybrid.  Space is a cold place to die.
